def_cn: （摸上去的）质地，质感，纹理
def_en: The texture of something is the way that it feels when you touch it, for example how smooth or rough it is.

def_cn: (尤指食品、土壤的)结构，构造
def_en: The texture of something, especially food or soil, is its structure, for example whether it is light with lots of holes, or very heavy and solid.

def_cn: (音乐、文学作品的)神韵，谐和统一（感）
def_en: The texture of a piece of music or a work of literature is the impression that it makes on you as a result of the way that its different elements are combined.
